item.title: News - Establishment of Miscanthus mother plantation for Ukrainian KSG Group, UA â€“ 05.2013
item.content: <p>In May 2013 our company completed an innovative, pilot project related with establishing the Miscanthus mother plantation in the regions of Dnipropetrovsk in the Ukraine.</p> <p>More information can be found at our website dedicated to projects being realized - <a href="projects-ksg-miskant">click here</a>.</p>
item.author: doran
